009
010package Ch25_SIFT;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.color.sets.ColorEnumeration.getColors;
013import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
014
015import java.awt.Color;
016import java.util.List;
017
018import ij.IJ;
019import ij.ImagePlus;
020import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
021import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
022import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
023import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
025import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
027import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftColor;
028import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftDescriptor;
029import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftDetector;
030import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftParameters;
031import imagingbook.sampleimages.SiftSampleImage;
032
033/**
034 * <p>
035 * This plugin extracts multi-scale SIFT features [1] from the current image and
036 * displays them as M-shaped markers. The list of keypoints (if shown) is sorted
037 * by descending magnitude. The input image is always converted to grayscale
038 * before SIFT feature detection is performed. See Ch. 25 of [2] for details.
039 * </p>
040 * <p>
041 * [1] D. G. Lowe. Distinctive image features from scale-invariant keypoints.
042 * International Journal of Computer Vision 60, 91â€“110 (2004).
043 * <br>
044 * [2] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
045 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
046 * </p>
047 * 
048 * @author WB
049 * @version 2022/04/01
050 * 
051 * @see SiftDetector
052 * @see SiftDescriptor
053 */
054
055public class Sift_Extract_Features implements PlugInFilter {
056        
057        private static SiftParameters params = new SiftParameters();
058        private static int MaxFeaturesToShow = 200;
059        private static double FeatureScale = 1.0; // 1.5;
060        private static double FeatureStrokewidth = 0.5;
061        private static boolean ListSiftFeatures = false;
062        private static Color[] ScaleLevelColors = getColors(SiftColor.class);
063        
064        private ImagePlus im;
065        
066        /**
067         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
068         * is currently open.
069         */
070        public Sift_Extract_Features() {
071                if (noCurrentImage()) {
072                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(SiftSampleImage.Castle);
073                }
074        }
075        
076        // ---------------------------------------------------
077        
078        @Override
079        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
080                this.im = im;
081                return DOES_ALL;
082        }
083
084        @Override
085        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {            
086                if (!runDialog()) {
087                        return;
088                }
089                
090                FloatProcessor fp = ip.convertToFloatProcessor();
091                SiftDetector detector = new SiftDetector(fp, params);
092                List<SiftDescriptor> features = detector.getSiftFeatures();
093                
094                ColoredStroke[] fStrokes = new ColoredStroke[ScaleLevelColors.length];
095                for (int i = 0; i < ScaleLevelColors.length; i++) {
096                        fStrokes[i] = new ColoredStroke(FeatureStrokewidth, ScaleLevelColors[i]);
097                }
098                
099                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
100                
101                int cnt = 1;
102                for (SiftDescriptor sf : features) {    
103                        ColoredStroke stroke = fStrokes[sf.getScaleLevel() % fStrokes.length];
104                        ola.addShape(sf.getShape(FeatureScale), stroke);
105                        if(++cnt > MaxFeaturesToShow) break;
106                }
107
108                im.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
109                
110                if (ListSiftFeatures) {
111                        int n = 1;
112                        for (SiftDescriptor sf : features) {
113                                IJ.log(n + ": " + sf.toString());
114                                if(++n > MaxFeaturesToShow) break;
115                        }
116                }
117        }
118        
119        // ---------------------------------------------------
120        
121        private boolean runDialog() {
122                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
123                gd.addMessage("This plugin expects a single image.");
124                DialogUtils.addToDialog(params, gd);
125                gd.addNumericField("Max. number of features to show", MaxFeaturesToShow);
126                gd.addCheckbox("List SIFT features)", ListSiftFeatures);
127                
128                gd.showDialog();
129                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
130                        return false;
131                }
132                
133                DialogUtils.getFromDialog(params, gd);
134                MaxFeaturesToShow = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
135                ListSiftFeatures = gd.getNextBoolean();
136                return true;
137        }
138
139}
